title: Joab Arranges Absalom’s Return
summary: Joab sends a woman with a parable to convince David to bring Absalom back from exile. David agrees but refuses to see him. After two years, Absalom forces Joab to act, and finally he is brought before David.

faq.question: Why did Joab intervene?
faq.answer: He saw David’s heart longing for Absalom and wanted reconciliation.

faq.question: How did Absalom get David’s attention?
faq.answer: He set Joab’s field on fire so Joab would arrange a meeting.
